comment.author: 26881258@N07
comment._content: Just for the sake of accuracy but the spelling of the English manufacturer is De Havilland which is consistently written almost everywhere in the great San Diego collection as De Haviland, including the tags. Please could you correct this as a search on De Havilland within SADSM will only return the 349 items which are correctly written.

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/varese2002] Thanks, will change, might take a while though!
